title: Request Surveying Services
description: A crew is ready to lay out the foundations for a new structure and needs a survey team to stake out the building corners.

tasks.description: Create a new survey request in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor initiates a new request.

tasks.description: Specify the coordinates that need to be staked out, referencing the official site plan drawing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor provides the required coordinates from the drawing.

tasks.description: Submit the request to the project's survey team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The survey team receives the request and schedules the work.
